jot.math.geometry.shape

Class AbstractShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.math.geometry.shape.AbstractShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Plane, Sphere, Triangle

    public abstract class AbstractShape
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that each shape must extend.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes
